tasks.label: Kill Port 8080
args: $connection = Get-NetTCPConnection -LocalPort 8080 -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue | Select-Object -First 1; if ($connection) { Stop-Process -Id $connection.OwningProcess -Force; Write-Host 'Port 8080 freed (PID ' + $connection.OwningProcess + ')' } else { Write-Host 'Port 8080 already free.' }
